HERO.TITLE:
Anything.{{zone}} — 
Where Anything Becomes Art
HERO.SUBTITLE: Your name, your brand, your passion — turn it into a stunning website. Create your personal space online with [anything].{{zone}}.

PERSONAL_CANVAS.TITLE: Your Personal Canvas Online
PERSONAL_CANVAS.SUBTITLE: With [anything].{{zone}}, you get more than just a website — you get a fully crafted digital space that reflects your creativity.

1.TITLE: Unique Address
1.DESCRIPTION: Choose any word, name, or idea — [anything].{{zone}} is your personal URL. Short, catchy, and unforgettable.

2.TITLE: Beautiful Templates
2.DESCRIPTION: Start with stunning, art-inspired designs. Whether you're a painter, musician, or photographer, we have the perfect template for you.

3.TITLE: Easy-to-Use Builder
3.DESCRIPTION: No coding needed. Drag, drop, and customize your site with our intuitive editor.

4.TITLE: All-in-One Solution
4.DESCRIPTION: Hosting, design, and publishing — everything you need to create and share your art online.

STEPS.TITLE: Create Your Site in 3 Simple Steps

1.TITLE: Choose Your Name
1.DESCRIPTION: Pick any word, name, or idea — [anything].{{zone}} is yours.

2.TITLE: Design Your Space
2.DESCRIPTION: Use our drag-and-drop editor to create a site that reflects your unique style.

3.TITLE: Share Your Art
3.DESCRIPTION: Publish your site and share it with the world. Your art, your way.

TEMPLATES.TITLE: Art-Inspired Templates for Every Creator
TEMPLATES.DESCRIPTION: Start with a design that matches your vision. From minimalist portfolios to vibrant galleries, we have the perfect template for you.

1.TITLE: Portfolio Template
1.DESCRIPTION: Showcase your work with a clean, professional layout.

2.TITLE: Gallery Template
2.DESCRIPTION: Display your art in a stunning, full-screen gallery.

3.TITLE: Music Template
3.DESCRIPTION: Share your music with a sleek, audio-focused design.

4.TITLE: Blog Template
4.DESCRIPTION: Tell your story with a beautifully designed blog.

MASTERPIECE.TITLE: Everything You Need to Create Your Digital Masterpiece

1.TITLE: Drag-and-Drop Editor
1.DESCRIPTION: Customize your site with ease. Add text, images, videos, and more — no coding required.

2.TITLE: Art-Inspired Design
2.DESCRIPTION: Choose from a collection of templates designed specifically for artists and creators.

3.TITLE: Reliable Hosting
3.DESCRIPTION: Your site is always online, with fast loading times and 99.9% uptime.

4.TITLE: Social Integration
4.DESCRIPTION: Share your site on social media with beautiful previews and easy links.

BENEFITS.TITLE: Try for Free!
BENEFITS.DESCRIPTION: One month free. Then only {{price}}/month. No credit card details required.

1.TITLE: Can I use my own domain?
1.DESCRIPTION: No, is.art provides unique addresses like [anything].{{zone}}, which work exclusively within our platform.

2.TITLE: Do I need coding skills?
2.DESCRIPTION: No, our editor is designed for everyone. Just drag, drop, and create.

3.TITLE: Can I change my site's design later?
3.DESCRIPTION: Yes, you can edit your site anytime to match your evolving style.
